text.headline: Timeline of my AI experience
text.text: From Python automation and front-end to full AI solutioning

text.headline: Python Automation
text.text: Building a platform migration tool fully implemented in jupyter notebooks

text.headline: React, Django, and Beyond
text.text: Understanding the frontend development space, including Edge CDN serverless space and graphQL ecosystem.

text.headline: Azure Virtual Desktop and SQL Server space
text.text: Designed and Tested a solution to bring a payroll company fully remote and in the cloud using Azure virtual desktop and SQL Server.  This allowed us to test new security measures and continue to operate during the pandemic.

text.headline: ETL Space
text.text: Designed, tested and debugged production level ETL solution for a large telecom company. Allowing for the streamlined divestiture of 10's of millions of dollars in obsolete inventory

text.headline: Data Science for the win!
text.text: Designed, implemented and tested a production solution for price optimization and inventory forecasting. Saving a fortune 100 manufacturing company upwards of 2 million dollars per year.

text.headline: ML from file to full fledged tracking
text.text: Redesigned and optimized ML Environment for a fortune 100 telecom company. Allowing them to streamline the entire ML growth process. Moved them from a file for tracking ML to a full dashboard with distributed ML capabilties!

text.headline: Masters of Science in AI and ML
text.text: Business-centric approach to learning and understanding the underlying math and logic behind some of the most popular ML and AI algorithms.

text.headline: Deep Fake Mitigation with Image Segmentation and Cyber Secrurity Techniques
text.text: Designed and implemented a solution to mitigate the impact of deep-fake technology on socio-economic systems.  This solution was implemented in a production environment and was able to create authentication keys related to watermarks produced by the company uploading the media.

text.headline: React, GraphQL and Gatsby
text.text: Built several progressive web applications for use with Gatsby, React and other front-end tools. This allowed me to understand the front-end development space and how to build a full stack application.

text.headline: Get Insights into your resume and whether that job will fit you
text.text: Using Advanced Generative AI techniques, I was able to build a solution that would allow you to upload your resume and get insights into whether that job would be a good fit for you.  This solution was built using a combination of vector embedding and retrieval agemented generation.

text.headline: Get inspired with the newest jobs in AI and tech
text.text: Using advanced generative AI agents to produce the top news for the week.  This solution was built using a combination of langchain agents and retrieval agemented generation.
